articles.title: Zelenskyy optimistic Ukraine will get European fighter jets - DW (English)
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodomyr Zelenskyy had a few key asks on his European tour this week. On one — a call for allies to send fighter jets — he claimed to see progress, but had little to show on the spot.
